examples.example: 星期日我们全家一起去公园享受美好的户外时光。

translate.english: On Sunday, our whole family went to the park to enjoy the wonderful outdoor time together.

examples.example: 每个星期日我都会和朋友们一起去做志愿者服务，感觉特别充实而有意义。

translate.english: Every Sunday I will go to do volunteer service with my friends, feeling particularly fulfilling and meaningful.

examples.example: 星期日的清晨，阳光明媚，鸟儿在枝头欢快地歌唱。

translate.english: On the early morning of Sunday, the sun is shining brightly and the birds are singing happily on the branches.
